name: timestamp
description: When the diagnostic check was run

name: overall_status
description: Overall health status: healthy, warning, or error

name: data_sources_healthy
description: Number of data sources with healthy status

name: data_sources_warning
description: Number of data sources with warning status

name: data_sources_error
description: Number of data sources with error status

name: master_tables_healthy
description: Number of master tables with healthy status

name: consistency_checks_passed
description: Number of consistency checks that passed

name: consistency_checks_failed
description: Number of consistency checks that failed

name: total_7day_revenue
description: Total revenue from all sources (last 7 days)

name: diagnostic_details
description: Full diagnostic response as JSON for detailed analysis

name: execution_time_ms
description: Time taken to run diagnostics in milliseconds
